value:
Order of Heroes... Odd name.
This is a group that kills and kills
for your homeland, yes?

In my world, I was a corpse.
Or nearly one since birth. But
meeting Nino...changed me.

Patrolling again, are you? That is
the effective way to find spies
and deter assassins.

We are making conversation,
aren't we? All right.$k$pThe best time to assassinate
someone is when the target is
eating or sleeping.

When I have time to myself, I think
of assassination. I have thought of
little else since my youngest days.

Don't run. I'm not here to deliver
death. Only a greeting from
$Nf.
Will this help me do...what I do?

I am Jaffar. Known also as the
Angel of Death. But only by those
in Black Fang—and now, you.

You are too kind—to me, to all
around us, to everyone.$k$pThat is your weak spot,
$Nu.$k$pYou make a grave mistake if
you think me a friend. I am your
tool to use. Nothing else.$k$pWhen I fail, cast me into the heap
with the trash and offal. You must,
for that is the way of life...$k$pWhat? You won't? Then you
leave me no choice but to live
on and on, serving you.$k$pKnow then that there is no
mission too cruel for me to
handle on your behalf.$k$pI will finish it. I will return to you.
There is no need to worry.
The human touch? Not for me.
I am known as the Angel of Death.
Do I know of...joy, sorrow, anger, dread? No.
A pile of corpses. Upon that I was born. An infant in a cradle of death.
